text: Fan xinyang, qianyi bingyong ziji de caichan he shengming wei an la zhidao fendou [zhu] zhe, yiji [wei tamen] tigong bihu he yuanzhu de ren, zhexie ren bici shi mengyou. Fan xinyang er wei [yu mu sheng yiqi] qianyi zhe, nimen [musilin] meiyou renhe zeren baohu tamen, chufei tamen qianyi. Jiaru tamen zai zongjiao fangmian xiang nimen qiuzhu, name, nimen bian you zeren bangzhu [tamen], dan duifu nimen yu tamen zhi jian you mengyue de minzhong ze buran. Fanshi nimen suo zuo de, an la shi quan shi de.
